PSCT.Vegas:
① If a face-up "Fire King" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step):
You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
② If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can send 1 FIRE from your Deck to the GY.
